import React from 'react' import './Fixture.css' import data from '../../data/data' function Fixture() { return (

Group A

{ data.groupA.matches.map( match =>

{data.countries[match.local-1].name} vs. {data.countries[match.visitor-1].name}

{new Date(match.date).getDate()}/{new Date(match.date).getMonth()}: {match.stadium} Stadium at {new Date(match.date).getUTCHours()}:00hs

) }
) } export default Fixture
